backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing Valentine UI updates, static assets, and video playback requirements with associated files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and design of each frontend component and styling file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base, components, and utility layers plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that renders the ValentineLetter experience.
frontend/src/components/Envelope.tsx: Animated envelope component that triggers an opening sequence and completion callback.
Playful No button that moves randomly within a container when interacted with.
Main flow controller switching between front, envelope, message, and video views with video upload support.
frontend/src/components/VideoView.tsx: Video player view that attempts autoplay with sound, shows a manual play prompt if blocked, and includes decorative accents.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useObjectUrl.ts: React hook that generates and cleans up an object URL for a File, automatically revoking it on unmount or file change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables, parchment textures, typography, and decorative utility classes for the Valentine theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React rendering with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, container settings, and plugins to match the project's romantic design palette.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Valentine's app features, design goals, required assets, and completed functionality.
